intro: That's the big word for "jobs" and Bible people had them just like we do today. Tell us what you know about these ancient occupations

questions.ask: What was Matthew's job before he became a disciple of Jesus?
What job did the youthful David have before his anointing as king?
Who was one of the two royal employees who shared a jail cell with the falsely accused Joseph?
What occupation did the apostle Paul have in addition to his missionary duties?
What was the occupation of the man Demetrius, a devotee, of the goddess Artemis, also known as Diana?

intro: None of us are getting any younger, you know. What can you recall about the elderly in the Bible?

questions.ask: What color hair, according to the Proverbs, is the "splendor of the old"?
What man lived the longest life recorded in the Bible - 969 years?
What son of Jared lived "only" 365 years but didn't die - because God took him away?
What elderly prophetess met Mary, Joseph, and the baby Jesus at the temple and thanked God for the redemption to come?
How old was Noah when God sent the flood to destroy the earth?

intro: Okay, here's a category where all the answers start with the letter O. Onward!

questions.ask: What "Mount of" was frequented by Jesus?
What Greek letter did Jesus pair with "Alpha" to describe Himself?
What kind of tree caught Absalom's head as he rode underneath on a mule, leaving him hanging?
What did Samuel tell King Saul is better than sacrifice?
What widowed woman left her mother-in-law, Naomi, and sister-in-law, Ruth, to return to her homeland of Moab?
